intro.title: Home to the world's most trusted communities
intro.subtitle1: Flow is easy to use and powerful to build with. Every aspect of the platform was designed from the ground up to support exceptional user experience at mainstream scale.
intro.subtitle2: Originally conceived by the team behind CryptoKitties, Flow today is a decentralized network supported and built on by a growing community of brands and Web3 builders.

flowCommunity.title: Be a part of the Flow community
